channel.title: TIMES NOW | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/Timesnow

item.title: Watch https://shorturl.at/Jzyjq || Hundreds of food lovers
item.description: Watch https://shorturl.at/Jzyjq || Hundreds of food lovers from Kerala and Coimbatore thronged the Boche Food Express train hotel to participate in the Chicken #Briyani contest. Winner to get Rs 1 lakh

item.title: Fire breaks out in a factory in Delhi's #UdyogNagar; no casu
item.description: Fire breaks out in a factory in Delhi's #UdyogNagar; no casualties reported. #Delhi #Factory #Fire

item.title: With the lens on women's safety across India after the Kolka
item.description: With the lens on women's safety across India after the Kolkata horror, Satara Police has taken proactive measures. The 'Abhaya' initiative has been launched with the efforts of IPS Sameer Shaikh, the DSP, Satara. What is the initiative, and how is this different from 'Dial 112'? Times Now dives into the real stories from across India to understand what's being done to keep her safe, part of the 'SAFEHER Times' campaign. Watch the video to find out more. #ShaktiFightBack
